column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I received hair in my food.  Had the kitchen manager not have dismissed it as if I jus complained about the color of the toast
column2: I would've given a better rating because at least the service would've been top notch.  But
column3: he dismissed it by just saying do you want another one.  No apology or anything similar.  The french toast (without hair) was just ok.  The ambiance is cool.  I doubt I will give them another chance because of the experience with the hair.
